page.title: 18BOULTON INFANT SCHOOL
page.content:
The name of our school is Boulton Infant School.It is on Wyndham Street Alvaston, Derby,and is 53 years old.
The school was built with brown bricks and has white wooden window frames.The canteen where we have our dinner is separate, and was built from brown bricks too,but has metal window frames.
At the front of our school is a small wall,with iron railings and iron gates. We have two playgrounds and two gardens.In the gardens are trees, flowers, and bushes.There is a playing field at the back of the building.
The Junior school is joined to the Infant building,which makes it one building,but we are separate schools.
